channel.title: No arrows gives a server crash
channel.description:
When someone attacks with a mage bow without any arrows then it the server crashes straight away...(Will post the crash if it happens again)
[code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NullPointerException at client.Range(client.java:23040) at client.Attack(client.java:19386) at client.process(client.java:13423) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:137) at server.main(server.java:46)[/code]
Anyone know how to fix this?
Thanks -Merked

item.title: No arrows gives a server crash
item.dc:creator: @haz_system haz system
item.description:
@haz_system wrote:

K wait a sec ill see what i can do[br][size=1]Posted on: March 02, 2007, 11:00:53 AM[/size][hr]Sorry i can’t find the thing, If your in luck try getting a plain Pimpscape source and hold CTRL and g to find the number where the errors occur E.G. at client.Range(client.java:23040)
find 23040 in a plain source and copy all the bit that u changed back.

Read full topic
